string.text: I want to fight. Whom do you have this time?
There is nobody to fight, come again later when we have a new batch of mutants from Duty.
There's a fee for participation: 1,000 roubles.
Fine, here's your money.
I don't have any money.
Darn it, another beggar here.
You owe me 2,000 roubles for participation.
Here's 2,000 roubles.
I have no money.
And where do these tramps come from in the Zone?
Pay 3,000 roubles for participation and the bloodsucker is ready.
Here's your money.
I don't have such a sum.
Damn, even my little son has such money.
Not so fast. First pay 5,000 roubles for the participation.
Here's the money.
I have no money.
Don't try pretending to be a beggar.
The price for participating is 5,000 roubles.
Of course, here's your money.
I don't have enough money.
Even stalkers can be tramps too.
There's a pseudodog. A large specimen, but quite beaten up. On the other hand, a very fierce one, same as my mother-in-law.
Deal. One more thing. Put a stake on the time to kill the monster within. If you manage it - you win, otherwise - you lose. The less the time taken, the bigger the reward won.
30 seconds, triple win.
One and a half minutes, double win.
Without a time limit. A half-stake win.
I changed my mind.
Tough shit. You've already paid.
I will try. Let me fight your dog.
No, I will not fight against the dog.
Our girl is afraid of the little doggie. Well, don't be upset.
There is a freak in a gas-mask, called a snork. Thin and feeble-looking but quite agile.
The fight is over. Welcome to the lounge.
Bring it on, I'll fight your snork.
No, I don't want to fight the snork.
Got scared by a half-rotten gas-masked freak?
This time we've got true luck. We caught a young bloodsucker. Still dumb, but already with bad manners.
Go ahead, get the bloodsucker ready.
No, I don't want to fight against the bloodsucker.
Aha! Got scared? Such as I expected.
This time we've got a little midget in a black cloack - a burer.
Bring this one out.
No, I don't want to fight against the burer.
He hardly reaches your waist in height. And he scares you?
It's a special day today. Don't know where they caught him, but it's a true beast.
Deal. Bring me the beast.
No, the beast is too much.
Well, frankly even I find the beast scary. But I will never fight in the arena, so who cares?
Got a couple of questions.
Shoot.
No more questions here.
What is this establishment?
This is the arena, my little business. A place where stalkers can test their mettle and earn their fame by fighting the horrors of the Zone.
How do you get the mutants here?

We made a deal with the Duty, instead of killing all the mutants they find they bring the weaker ones here in exchange for cash. Duty gets paid, the mutants get killed, and then I get paid. Everybody wins.
Where are you from?
I am from many places. I heard about this little backwater and understood that I can earn a good little penny here. So here I am.
What are the rules?

Oh, the rules are pretty simple. I invented them myself. There's a cage, and a mutant is let inside the cage. You pay money and choose the time you need to kill the monster. If you make it - you win, if you don't - I win.
I've got myself a new pet. Want to try yourself against it?
So, what are you waiting for? Get into the cage.
Sorry, there's nobody to fight against yet. Wait for a day or two until we can catch a new mutant.
There you are! Well done! Here's your win. If you desire another fight for money - drop in.
Sorry, bro, but you lose. Come again next time if you want.
Oh, hello. What's up?
What do you need, stalker?.
You here to buy some shit?
Hey guy, how goes the Zone? So...I hope you have repair work that needs done...Heh, I need some cash bad.
